spells.name: Dance of Arrows
spells.description: Kindred tumbles and shoots up to three arrows at nearby targets.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Kindred tumbles and shoots up to three arrows at nearby targets.
spells.tooltip:
Lamb vaults, firing up to 3 arrows at nearby enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

Casting Wolf's Frenzy or vaulting inside of its effect reduces the cooldown of this spell to {{ e4 }} seconds.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Lamb vaults, firing up to 3 arrows at nearby enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. Casting Wolf's Frenzy or vaulting inside of its effect reduces the cooldown of this spell to {{ e4 }} seconds.

spells.name: Wolf's Frenzy
spells.description: Wolf enrages and attacks enemies around him.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Wolf enrages and attacks enemies around him.
spells.tooltip:
Passive: As Kindred move they build stacks of Hunter's Vigor, up to a maximum of 100. At full stacks Lamb's next basic attack drains {{ f1 }} health from the target.

Active: Wolf claims a territory, attacking nearby enemies inside it for {{ e4 }} seconds. Lamb can direct him to targets by attacking them. If Lamb leaves Wolf's territory he will cease attacking and join her.

Wolf's attacks deal physical damage equal to {{ e5 }} (+{{ f2 }}) plus {{ e3 }}% of the damage from Mark of the Kindred.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Passive: As Kindred move they build stacks of Hunter's Vigor, up to a maximum of 100. At full stacks Lamb's next basic attack drains {{ f1 }} health from the target. Active: Wolf claims a territory, attacking nearby enemies inside it for {{ e4 }} seconds. Lamb can direct him to targets by attacking them. If Lamb leaves Wolf's territory he will cease attacking and join her. Wolf's attacks deal physical damage equal to {{ e5 }} (+{{ f2 }}) plus {{ e3 }}% of the damage from Mark of the Kindred.

spells.name: Mounting Dread
spells.description: Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage.
spells.tooltip:
Cripple an enemy, slowing their movement speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e8 }} second.

After Lamb attacks the target twice, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, dealing massive physical damage.

Wolf deals physical damage equal to {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) +{{ e4 }}% of the target's maximum health. [Maximum {{ e10 }} vs. monsters]
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Cripple an enemy, slowing their movement speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e8 }} second. After Lamb attacks the target twice, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, dealing massive physical damage. Wolf deals physical damage equal to {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) +{{ e4 }}% of the target's maximum health. [Maximum {{ e10 }} vs. monsters]

spells.name: Lamb's Respite
spells.description: Lamb grants all living things inside a zone a respite from death. Until the effect ends, nothing can die. At the end, units are healed.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Lamb grants all living things inside a zone a respite from death. Until the effect ends, nothing can die. At the end, units are healed.
spells.tooltip:
Lamb blesses the ground under a friendly champion for {{ e2 }} seconds, creating an area in which no living things, ally or enemy, can die. Upon reaching 10% Health, units become immune to further damage or healing.

When the blessing ends all living things inside heal for {{ e1 }}.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Lamb blesses the ground under a friendly champion for {{ e2 }} seconds, creating an area in which no living things, ally or enemy, can die. Upon reaching 10% Health, units become immune to further damage or healing. When the blessing ends all living things inside heal for {{ e1 }}.
